Qilong Zhu

About Me

I’m an Operations and Supply Chain Management Ph.D. candidate at Texas A&M University’s Mays Business School, working under the mentorship of Prof. Gregory R. Heim.

Research Interests

  • Online Retailing
  • Craft Business
  • Healthcare
  • Sustainable Operations
